comments: I had him in Suffolk. BEST PROFESSOR IVE EVER HAD. He\'s not a teacher you can do nothing in pass but he\'s the fairest teacher out there. you do all your work no matter what the result as long you try he passes you.he speaks clear on what he expects from his students and he is always their when you need help.i wish ALL my professors were like him.

Great Professor, he actually can keep you interested the entire class period. He is a great teacher, who truely wants his students to succeed. He does give a good amount of work. I recommend you keep up with the POMI\'s!!!
The course isn\'t my favorite, but the prof makes the best of it. He is knowledgable and experienced, and a good lecturer. Expect a lot of work.

I like the prof, but you have to write like a 50 page summary of the textbook, which, IMO, is a totally ridiculous assignment for graduate students. There\'s not much substance to this class, I would have rather taken a class where I actually learned something I could use one day. Instead I\'m stuck doing countless hours of busywork. BLAH AVOID.

Prof. DeKams offers the most practical and useful information; you will use everything he teaches in your classroom;he is hilarious, engaged and and excellent teacher. I would take another class with him in a heartbeat!
Enjoyed the class. Assignments were clear and the class discussion provided thoughtful insight. I would recommend this professor without hesitation.
Professor DeKams is a highly experienced educator who truly enjoys his profession. Engaging orator who has a lot to offer prospective teachers. Would recommend this professor.
Great Class. He has a wealth full of knowledge to share. He grades very fairly. Great rubrics. Uses Blackboard, everything is posted for you! Just a lot of reading.
